F_VISIBILITY_COUNTING_TOTAL_VISIBLE.question: How many objects remain visible for the entire sequence?

F_VISIBILITY_COUNTING_EVER_VISIBLE.question: How many unique objects become visible at any time?

F_VISIBILITY_COUNTING_OCCLUDED.question: How many objects become completely occluded at any point?

F_VISIBILITY_ATTRIBUTE_LAST_DISAPPEAR.question: Which object is the last to disappear from view?

F_VISIBILITY_ATTRIBUTE_LONGEST_OCCLUDER.question: Which object causes the longest occlusion of another object?

F_VISIBILITY_ESTIMATION_VISIBLE_DURATION.question: What is the approximate duration that the object stays visible?

F_VISIBILITY_ATTRIBUTE_ENTRY_SIDE.question: From which side of the frame does the object first enter?

F_TEMPORAL_ATTRIBUTE_FIRST_CONTACT.question: Which object contacts the ground first?

F_TEMPORAL_ATTRIBUTE_LAST_EXIT.question: Which object leaves the frame last?

F_TEMPORAL_COUNTING_SIMULTANEOUS_MOVE.question: How many objects move simultaneously when the target object begins to fall?

F_TEMPORAL_COUNTING_PHASES.question: How many distinct motion phases does the target object go through?

F_TEMPORAL_ESTIMATION_INTERVAL_COLLISION.question: What is the approximate time between the first and second collisions?

F_TEMPORAL_ESTIMATION_STATIC_DURATION.question: For how long does the object remain stationary before moving?

F_TEMPORAL_ATTRIBUTE_PEAK_SPEED_INTERVAL.question: During which time interval does the object reach its maximum speed?

F_KINEMATICS_COUNTING_LINEAR_MOTION.question: How many objects undergo sustained linear motion?

F_KINEMATICS_COUNTING_ROTATION.question: How many objects rotate around any axis during the sequence?

F_KINEMATICS_ATTRIBUTE_LARGEST_DISPLACEM.question: Which object experiences the largest displacement?

F_KINEMATICS_ATTRIBUTE_MAX_ANGULAR_SPEED.question: Which object spins with the highest angular speed?

F_KINEMATICS_ATTRIBUTE_PATH_SHAPE.question: What is the general shape of the target object's trajectory?

F_KINEMATICS_ESTIMATION_DISPLACEMENT_TAR.question: What is the approximate displacement of the target object?

F_KINEMATICS_ESTIMATION_ANGULAR_DISPLACE.question: What is the approximate angular displacement of the object?

F_KINEMATICS_ESTIMATION_PEAK_ACCELERATIO.question: What is the approximate peak acceleration of the target object?

F_SPATIAL_ATTRIBUTE_DIRECTLY_ABOVE.question: Which object is directly above the target at the start?

F_SPATIAL_ATTRIBUTE_IN_FRONT.question: Which object is in front of the target relative to the camera?

F_SPATIAL_ATTRIBUTE_CLOSEST_FINAL.question: Which object is closest to the target in the final frame?

F_SPATIAL_COUNTING_LEFT_OF_TARGET.question: How many objects are positioned to the left of the target object?

F_SPATIAL_COUNTING_WITHIN_DISTANCE.question: How many objects are within one meter of the target object's center?

F_SPATIAL_ESTIMATION_DISTANCE_PAIR.question: What is the approximate distance between the target object and the reference object?

F_SPATIAL_ESTIMATION_HEIGHT_ABOVE_GROUND.question: What is the approximate height of the target object above the ground?

F_DEFORMATION_COUNTING_PERMANENT.question: How many objects remain deformed at the end of the sequence?

F_DEFORMATION_COUNTING_BENDING.question: How many objects bend without breaking?

F_DEFORMATION_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE.question: What type of deformation does the object undergo?

F_DEFORMATION_ATTRIBUTE_MAX.question: Which object shows the greatest amount of deformation?

F_DEFORMATION_ATTRIBUTE_TRIGGER.question: Which event triggers the deformation of the object?

F_DEFORMATION_ESTIMATION_DURATION.question: For how long does the deformation persist?

F_DEFORMATION_ESTIMATION_REQUIRED_FORCE.question: What is the approximate force required to produce the observed deformation?

F_MASS_COUNTING_HEAVIER_THAN_REFERENCE.question: How many objects are heavier than the reference object?

F_MASS_COUNTING_LIGHTER_THAN_REFERENCE.question: How many objects are lighter than the reference object?

F_MASS_ATTRIBUTE_HEAVIEST.question: Which object appears to have the greatest mass?

F_MASS_ATTRIBUTE_LIGHTEST.question: Which object appears to have the smallest mass?

F_MASS_ESTIMATION_TARGET.question: What is the approximate mass of the target object?

F_VOLUME_COUNTING_LARGER_THAN_REFERENCE.question: How many objects have a volume larger than the reference object?

F_VOLUME_ATTRIBUTE_MOST_VOLUME.question: Which object occupies the greatest volume?

F_VOLUME_ESTIMATION_TARGET.question: What is the approximate volume of the target object?

F_COLLISION_COUNTING_TOTAL_EVENTS.question: How many collisions occur during the sequence?

F_COLLISION_COUNTING_TARGET_CONTACTS.question: How many times does the target object collide with another object?

F_COLLISION_ATTRIBUTE_FIRST_INITIATOR.question: Which object initiates the first collision?

F_COLLISION_ATTRIBUTE_LAST_CONTACT.question: Which objects are involved in the final collision?

F_COLLISION_ATTRIBUTE_OUTCOME.question: What is the immediate outcome of the primary collision?

F_COLLISION_ESTIMATION_IMPACT_SPEED.question: What is the approximate relative speed at the moment of collision?

F_COLLISION_ESTIMATION_ENERGY_LOSS.question: What fraction of kinetic energy is lost in the collision?

F_FORCES_COUNTING_PUSHED_OBJECTS.question: How many objects are set in motion by a direct push?

F_FORCES_COUNTING_BALANCED.question: How many objects experience balanced forces throughout the event?

F_FORCES_ATTRIBUTE_PRIMARY_FORCE.question: Which force primarily causes the object's movement?

F_FORCES_ATTRIBUTE_DIRECTION_NET.question: In which direction does the net force act on the target object?

F_FORCES_ATTRIBUTE_MAX_FRICTION.question: Which object experiences the greatest frictional force?

F_FORCES_ESTIMATION_NET_FORCE.question: What is the approximate net force acting on the target object?

F_FORCES_ESTIMATION_TORQUE.question: What is the approximate torque applied about the object's pivot?
